column2: So the Democrats want to invite caravan after caravan and I don't know if you know  you see the big caravan coming in?
column4: The Democrats want to invite caravan after caravan of illegal aliens into our country. And they want to sign them up for free health care, free welfare, free education, and for the right to vote.

column2: But caravan after caravan is forming unvetted, illegal aliens trying to flood into our country on your dollar, over whelming your schools, depleting your resources, and endangering your community.
column4: The Democrats want to invite caravan after caravan of illegal aliens into our country. And they want to sign them up for free health care, free welfare, free education, and for the right to vote.

column2: Nearly 100 percent of heroin in the United States enters though the southern border, along with roughly 90 percent of cocaine, the majority of meth and a substantial portion of the ultra lethal fentanyl killing a youth drug, fentanyl  the worst.
column4: Heroin .. pours across our southern borders.

column2: They want to take away your good health care, and essentially use socialism to turn America into Venezuela and Democrats want to totally open the borders.

column2: Thank you, and we started the wall and built 1.6 billion and we have another 1.6 billion and then get another 1.6 billion.

column2: I want to build it all at one time, but wait till  wait till you see  go home and see tonight what our great military is doing on the border.

column2: We gave them the largest pay raise they've had in more than a decade.
column4: Says the 2018 defense authorization bill includes raises for the military "for the first time in 10 years."
